descriptions.content: This is the best known system. It belongs to the treasure of a group of treasure-finders of which Shenchen Luga is the first and most prominent (this list is given with explanations in Snellgrove 1988, p. 1356; this is also the doxography his Nine Ways of Bon discusses).
